name: FreeTESA
short_description: The Oregon Department of Education uses an expensive electronic testing Web application for its K-12 State Assessments. This project aims to provide an open, free alternative to the current systems. Please help us save money earmarked for education!

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)
